The_possibilities_of_artificial_intellig: The possibilities of artificial intelligence (AI) seem endless. It’s predicted that AI will soon have the ability to write articles, screen movies, and even drive cars on our behalf. But what about copywriting? Can AI be the next copywriter? I’ve spent the past few weeks doing some research and experimenting, and I’ve come up with a few ideas for how AI will change the world of copywriting.
